content: This is a list of recipients of the [Darjah Utama Temasek](/wiki/Darjah_Utama_Temasek), the highest civilian honour and the second most prestigious [national honour](/wiki/Orders,_decorations,_and_medals_of_Singapore) overall, conferred by the [President of Singapore](/wiki/President_of_Singapore). ## Recipients This along with the ^ ([caret](/wiki/Caret)) indicates the individual was admitted to the Darjah Utama Temasek in an honorary capacity. This along with the * ([asterisk](/wiki/Asterisk)) indicates the individual was admitted to the Darjah Utama Temasek [posthumously](/wiki/Posthumous_award)List of Darjah Utama Temasek recipients, with the year, grade, and role(s) held YearRecipientGrade (if any)Role(s)Notes1962[Yusof Ishak](/wiki/Yusof_Ishak)First Class*[Yang di-Pertuan Negara](/wiki/Yang_di-Pertuan_Negara)* of Singapore1962[Lim Kim San](/wiki/Lim_Kim_San) - Chairman, [Housing and Development Board](/wiki/Housing_and_Development_Board) - Deputy chairman, [Economic Development Board](/wiki/Economic_Development_Board) - Deputy chairman, [Public Service Commission](/wiki/Public_Service_Commission_(Singapore)) - Board member, [Singapore Polytechnic](/wiki/Singapore_Polytechnic) 1963[Ahmed Ben Bella](/wiki/Ahmed_Ben_Bella)^[Prime Minister of Algeria](/wiki/Prime_Minister_of_Algeria)1964[Gamal Abdel Nasser](/wiki/Gamal_Abdel_Nasser)^[President of Egypt](/wiki/President_of_Egypt)1967[Eisaku Sat≈ç](/wiki/Eisaku_Sat%C5%8D)^[Prime Minister of Japan](/wiki/Prime_Minister_of_Japan)1967[Norodom Sihanouk](/wiki/Norodom_Sihanouk)^[Head of State of Cambodia](/wiki/List_of_heads_of_state_of_Cambodia)1972[Elizabeth II](/wiki/Elizabeth_II)^First Class[Queen of the United Kingdom](/wiki/Queen_of_the_United_Kingdom)1972[Prince Philip, Duke of Edinburgh](/wiki/Prince_Philip,_Duke_of_Edinburgh)^First Class[Consort of the British monarch](/wiki/List_of_British_royal_consorts)1974[Ferdinand Marcos](/wiki/Ferdinand_Marcos)^First Class[President of the Philippines](/wiki/President_of_the_Philippines)1974[Suharto](/wiki/Suharto)^First Class[President of Indonesia](/wiki/President_of_Indonesia)1984[Hon Sui Sen](/wiki/Hon_Sui_Sen)*First ClassFormer [Minister of Finance](/wiki/Ministry_of_Finance_(Singapore)#Ministers)1985[Goh Keng Swee](/wiki/Goh_Keng_Swee)First ClassFormer [Deputy Prime Minister of Singapore](/wiki/Deputy_Prime_Minister_of_Singapore)1990[Hassanal Bolkiah](/wiki/Hassanal_Bolkiah)^First Class[Sultan of Brunei](/wiki/Sultan_of_Brunei)1990[S. Rajaratnam](/wiki/S._Rajaratnam)First ClassFormer Deputy Prime Minister of Singapore1993[Wee Kim Wee](/wiki/Wee_Kim_Wee)First ClassFormer [President of Singapore](/wiki/President_of_Singapore)1999[Yong Pung How](/wiki/Yong_Pung_How)First ClassFormer [Chief Justice of Singapore](/wiki/Chief_Justice_of_Singapore)2005[Sirajuddin of Perlis](/wiki/Sirajuddin_of_Perlis)^[King of Malaysia](/wiki/King_of_Malaysia)[*citation needed*]2007[S. Dhanabalan](/wiki/S._Dhanabalan)Second Class - Former Chairman, [Temasek Holdings](/wiki/Temasek_Holdings) - Member, [Council of Presidential Advisers](/wiki/Powers_of_the_president_of_Singapore) 2008[Chan Sek Keong](/wiki/Chan_Sek_Keong)Second ClassFormer Chief Justice of Singapore2009[Qaboos bin Said](/wiki/Qaboos_bin_Said)^First Class[Sultan of Oman](/wiki/Sultan_of_Oman)2013[S. R. Nathan](/wiki/S._R._Nathan)First ClassFormer President of Singapore2014[Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono](/wiki/Susilo_Bambang_Yudhoyono)^First ClassPresident of Indonesia2015S. DhanabalanFirst ClassChairman, Temasek2018[Tony Tan](/wiki/Tony_Tan)First ClassFormer President of Singapore2019[J. Y. Pillay](/wiki/J._Y._Pillay)DistinctionFormer chairman, Council of Presidential Advisers2020[S. Jayakumar](/wiki/S._Jayakumar_(Singaporean_politician))High DistinctionSenior legal adviser, [Minister for Foreign Affairs](/wiki/Ministry_of_Foreign_Affairs_(Singapore))2023[Halimah Yacob](/wiki/Halimah_Yacob)High DistinctionFormer President of Singapore
title: List of Darjah Utama Temasek recipients
